_sText:
So this is my first bhop map so don't expect it to be perfect, I only used dev textures because I wanted to focus and practice good game play. Thanks to Buggajayjay for helping me learn the basics of hammer and answering all of my stupid questions I really appreciate it! =) 

Any and all critique is welcome, I do plan on making a series of color shade maps so if you have any tips or ideas you want me to try let me know.

Edit- I fixed the surfs along with the surf triggers

Edit2- fixed the lighting
